1️⃣ Windowing & Input

GLFW — Create windows, handle input (keyboard/mouse), manage OpenGL context

Website: https://www.glfw.org/download.html

2️⃣ OpenGL Loader

GLAD — Load modern OpenGL functions dynamically

Website: https://glad.dav1d.de/

3️⃣ Math Library

GLM — GLSL-like math library (vectors, matrices, transforms)

GitHub: https://github.com/g-truc/glm

4️⃣ Debug / UI

Dear ImGui — Lightweight GUI for debugging, tools, editors

GitHub: https://github.com/ocornut/imgui

5️⃣ Image & Texture Loading

stb_image.h — Simple image loader for textures (PNG, JPG, etc.)

GitHub: https://github.com/nothings/stb

6️⃣ Optional / Future Expansion

Assimp — Import 3D models (OBJ, FBX, etc.)

Website: https://www.assimp.org/

Bullet Physics — Physics simulation (optional for RTS if needed)

Website: https://pybullet.org/

spdlog — Fast logging for debugging

GitHub: https://github.com/gabime/spdlog

entt — Optional ECS framework for faster prototyping

GitHub: https://github.com/skypjack/entt
